reviews.text: One of the best hostels( for me the best ) in Berlin. If u need a cheap hostel, with good location and amazing service, so Freiraum hostel is for you. It was my first time in Berlin and it was so good. Also u can get a free coffee every morning. Highly recommend it ðŸ˜ŒðŸ˜ŒðŸ˜Œ

I lived there for one month when I was attending a bootcamp in Berlin. I was satisfied with the clean room and shared bathroom and quiet nights and neighbourhood. I recommend it to those want to find a good hostel with nice staff.

I was there for Labour Day and the location was perfect to watch the celebrations. At the same time it wasn't chaotic and still very cosy around the front of the hostel. The staff was very friendly and went the extra mile make us feel welcome which was an added bonus on an already great stay! I was very happy with the room and amenities we were provided with and will definitely be staying there again!
The rooms were clean, and there was no noise from the outside. There were a few stores and dining options near the Hostel. The host was very kind too.

The owner is super nice and helpful.
The rooms seem very old and small. Rooms donâ€™t seems to match pictures on the homepage.
Thank you for the stay!
